To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Interview with Karen Fairchild, Kimberly Schlapman, Phillip Sweet, and Jimi Westbrook collectively known as Little Big Town from the CMA Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 27, 2018. Moderated by Michael McCall. Includes audio from video presentations. Presented in support of the exhibit Little Big Town: The Power of Four.

subject.topic: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.)
